strapiPost.title: Terrific Tuesdays
strapiPost.content:
You can go ahead and block Tuesdays off on your calendar for the summer, because Terrific Tuesdays are back at the Botanical Garden of the Ozarks at Lake Fayetteville.

  • A Fayetteville tradition, Terrific Tuesdays at the Botanical Garden includes free admission and extended hours from 5 - 8p each Tuesday starting June 1 and running through August.
  • There's more? In addition to free admission and extended hours, you'll be able to enjoy a free concert at the garden on Jun 22, Jul 13, and Aug 17.

If you want to learn more about the Botanical Gardens or the event, check out the site HERE.
